h1_38: Brigham and Women's Hospital/Harvard Medical School Program
p_65: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_69: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_82: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_100: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_103: The Brigham and Women's Hospital (BWH) Diagnostic Radiology Residency aims to provide world-class training to our residents to develop future leaders in the field of radiology. We seek resident applicants of diverse backgrounds with varied clinical and extraclinical interests, which we believe truly enriches the learning environment. We value academic and clinical excellence, intellectual curiosity and desire for discovery and innovation, leadership potential, collegiality and kindness.

p_359: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
